description: This file contains unit tests for the JSON storage system within the agno project, specifically testing CRUD operations, filtering, and session management for agent and workflow sessions.

classes.name: AgentSession
classes.description: Represents a session for an agent, including session ID, agent ID, user ID, memory, agent data, session data, and extra data.

classes.name: WorkflowSession
classes.description: Represents a session for a workflow, including session ID, workflow ID, user ID, memory, workflow data, session data, and extra data.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Fixture that creates and yields a temporary directory as a Path object.

methods.name: agent_storage
methods.description: Fixture that initializes a JsonStorage instance for agent sessions with a temporary directory.

methods.name: workflow_storage
methods.description: Fixture that initializes a JsonStorage instance for workflow sessions with a temporary directory.

methods.name: test_agent_storage_crud
methods.description: Tests create, read, update (upsert), get all, and delete operations for agent storage.

methods.name: test_workflow_storage_crud
methods.description: Tests create, read, update (upsert), get all, and delete operations for workflow storage.

methods.name: test_storage_filtering
methods.description: Tests filtering of agent sessions by user_id and entity_id, including combined filtering.

methods.name: test_workflow_storage_filtering
methods.description: Tests filtering of workflow sessions by user_id and entity_id, including combined filtering and non-existent IDs.
